name: container-manager
description: Databox OS container manager and dashboard server

scripts.build: node-sass --output-style compressed src/www/styles/ -o src/www/styles/ && pug -cD src/www/templates/
scripts.watch: node-sass --output-style compressed -w src/www/styles/ -o src/www/styles/ |  pug -cwD src/www/templates/
scripts.dockerclean: docker kill $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rmi -f $(docker images -q)

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
